sec.p: Soil properties were measured as follows: pH was measured with a glass electrode at a 1:2.5 (w/v) soil‐to‐water ratio; total carbon (C) and total nitrogen (N) with an Elementar Vario EL III (Elementar Analysensysteme GmbH, Germany); total phosphorus (P), total calcium (Ca), and total magnesium (Mg) with an Inductively Coupled Plasma‐Atomic Emission Spectrometer (ICP‐AES) (iCAP 6300, Thermo Jarrell Ash Co.); particle size distribution (PSD) with an X‐ray diffractometer (Rigaku D/Max 2550pc, Rigaku Corporation) at a voltage of 40 kV and current of 300 mA.
